name: Off the controller
description:
Main:

Off the controller is a small platformer where you play as a button on a device that falls "Off the controller". You must roll away from the hand trying to get you back on the controller using boosters throughout the levels and your limited move-set. 

Gameplay:

When you begin a level you will be asked to choose a button this button will correspond to control that you will be unable to use, for example "b" is the jump button so if you click the "b" button on the device you will be unable to jump.
